EmailTemplate.name: 202101_Global_Space_MicroElectronics_Email-Auto-Responder.Email 1- plain text
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your microelectronic inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
My name is Tom and I’m the technical sales manager for Honeywell’s microelectronic portfolio. I'm excited that you are considering our products for your next project.
To help us best serve you, please take a minute to tell us a little more about your inquiry:
- What is your role? - Is your question technical (product selection / data sheet) or transactional (quote / lead time)?
Thanks for your time.
Tom
